New Records: Canada recorded their first win in the T20 World Cup
The match saw the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium cross 100 runs for the first time in the tournament
Key Match Events: Jeremy Gordon and Dillon Heyliger's bowling performances
George Dockrell and Mark Adair's partnership for Ireland
Pre-Game Insights: Ireland chose to bowl first, which was a strategic decision
The pitch conditions were a focus before the match due to previous criticism
Post-Match Reflections: Canada's players and staff expressed happiness over the win
Ireland's players and fans reacted to the loss
The match was significant as it was the second upset by an associate team against a full member in two days
Miscellaneous Highlights: The improved pitch conditions were a key factor
The match had historical significance as it crossed 100 runs for the first time in the tournament at that venue
